dataSource.primary: Congressional Budget Office - Monthly Budget Review FY2022, U.S. Treasury Fiscal Data, Office of Management and Budget Historical Tables

categories.name: Social Security
categories.description: Retirement, disability, and survivors benefits for 70 million Americans

subcategories.name: Retirement Benefits (OASI)
subcategories.description: Monthly benefits for 51 million retired workers and their dependents

subcategories.name: Survivors Benefits
subcategories.description: Benefits for 6 million survivors of deceased workers

subcategories.name: Disability Insurance (SSDI)
subcategories.description: Benefits for 8.9 million disabled workers and their dependents

subcategories.name: Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
subcategories.description: Income assistance for low-income elderly and disabled individuals

categories.name: Medicare
categories.description: Health insurance for 64 million Americans 65+ and certain younger people with disabilities

subcategories.name: Part A - Hospital Insurance
subcategories.description: Inpatient hospital care, skilled nursing facility care, hospice care

subcategories.name: Part B - Medical Insurance
subcategories.description: Doctor visits, outpatient care, medical supplies, preventive services

subcategories.name: Part D - Prescription Drug Coverage
subcategories.description: Prescription drug coverage for Medicare beneficiaries

subcategories.name: Part C - Medicare Advantage
subcategories.description: Private health plan option including Parts A, B, and usually D

categories.name: National Defense
categories.description: Department of Defense military operations, personnel, equipment, and R&D

subcategories.name: Military Personnel
subcategories.description: Pay, allowances, and benefits for active duty, reserve, and National Guard

subcategories.name: Operations & Maintenance
subcategories.description: Training, base operations, equipment maintenance, logistics

subcategories.name: Procurement
subcategories.description: Aircraft, ships, vehicles, weapons systems, and ammunition

subcategories.name: Research & Development
subcategories.description: Defense technology development and military R&D programs

subcategories.name: Military Construction & Family Housing
subcategories.description: Base construction, facility improvements, military family housing

subcategories.name: Other Defense Activities
subcategories.description: Defense-wide activities, intelligence, special operations support

categories.name: Interest on National Debt
categories.description: Interest payments on federal debt - rapidly increasing category

subcategories.name: Interest on Public Debt
subcategories.description: Interest paid to holders of Treasury securities (bonds, notes, bills)

subcategories.name: Interest on Intragovernmental Holdings
subcategories.description: Interest on debt held by Social Security, Medicare trust funds, and other government accounts

categories.name: Healthcare (Non-Medicare)
categories.description: Medicaid, CHIP, ACA subsidies, and other federal health programs

subcategories.name: Medicaid
subcategories.description: Healthcare coverage for low-income individuals and families (federal share)

subcategories.name: Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP)
subcategories.description: Health coverage for children in families earning too much for Medicaid

subcategories.name: ACA Marketplace Subsidies
subcategories.description: Premium tax credits and cost-sharing reductions for Affordable Care Act plans

categories.name: Veterans Benefits
categories.description: Healthcare, disability compensation, pensions, and education for veterans

subcategories.name: Veterans Health Administration (VHA)
subcategories.description: Medical care, mental health services, and hospitals for veterans

subcategories.name: Disability Compensation & Pensions
subcategories.description: Monthly payments to veterans with service-connected disabilities

subcategories.name: GI Bill & Education Benefits
subcategories.description: Tuition assistance, housing allowances, and vocational training

subcategories.name: Burial Benefits & Memorial Services
subcategories.description: National cemeteries, burial allowances, and memorial benefits

subcategories.name: Veterans Housing & Other Benefits
subcategories.description: Home loan guarantees, vocational rehabilitation, and other services

categories.name: Income Security
categories.description: SNAP, housing assistance, unemployment benefits, EITC, child tax credits, and family support programs

subcategories.name: Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC)
subcategories.description: Refundable tax credit for low and moderate-income working families

subcategories.name: Child Tax Credit (CTC)
subcategories.description: Tax credit to help families with child-rearing expenses

subcategories.name: Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
subcategories.description: Food assistance for 41.2 million low-income Americans

subcategories.name: Housing Assistance
subcategories.description: Section 8 vouchers, public housing, rental assistance programs

subcategories.name: Unemployment Insurance
subcategories.description: Temporary income for workers who lose jobs through no fault of their own

subcategories.name: COVID Relief Programs (Ending)
subcategories.description: Final year of major pandemic relief including stimulus checks and expanded unemployment

subcategories.name: School Nutrition Programs
subcategories.description: Free and reduced-price school meals, summer feeding programs

subcategories.name: Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
subcategories.description: Cash assistance and support services for low-income families with children

subcategories.name: Child Care & Development Block Grant
subcategories.description: Subsidized child care for low-income working families

subcategories.name: WIC (Women, Infants, and Children)
subcategories.description: Nutrition assistance for pregnant women, new mothers, and young children

subcategories.name: Energy Assistance & Other Programs
subcategories.description: LIHEAP (heating/cooling assistance), foster care, adoption assistance, other support

categories.name: Education
categories.description: Federal student aid, K-12 support, special education, and higher education programs

subcategories.name: Federal Student Loans & Pell Grants
subcategories.description: Student loan programs, Pell Grants for low-income college students

subcategories.name: Title I - Low-Income School Support
subcategories.description: Federal aid to schools serving high percentages of low-income students

subcategories.name: Special Education (IDEA)
subcategories.description: Individuals with Disabilities Education Act funding for special needs students

subcategories.name: Head Start
subcategories.description: Early childhood education for low-income preschoolers

subcategories.name: Career & Technical Education
subcategories.description: Vocational training, workforce development, community college programs

subcategories.name: Impact Aid & School Improvements
subcategories.description: Support for schools on federal lands, rural schools, school improvement grants

categories.name: Transportation
categories.description: Highways, bridges, public transit, airports, and transportation infrastructure - boosted by Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act

subcategories.name: Federal Highway Administration
subcategories.description: Interstate highways, bridges, road safety programs, highway grants to states

subcategories.name: Federal Aviation Administration
subcategories.description: Air traffic control, airport improvements, aviation safety regulation

subcategories.name: Federal Transit Administration
subcategories.description: Subway systems, buses, light rail, transit infrastructure grants

subcategories.name: Federal Railroad Administration
subcategories.description: Amtrak subsidies, rail safety, high-speed rail development

subcategories.name: Maritime Administration & Ports
subcategories.description: Port infrastructure, maritime security, shipping programs

subcategories.name: Transportation Safety & Other Programs
subcategories.description: Pipeline safety, hazmat transport, transportation research

categories.name: Everything Else
categories.description: All other federal government operations and programs

subcategories.name: Agriculture & Rural Development
subcategories.description: Farm subsidies, crop insurance, food safety, rural infrastructure

subcategories.name: International Affairs & Foreign Aid
subcategories.description: State Department, USAID, embassies, humanitarian assistance, diplomacy

subcategories.name: Science, Space & Technology
subcategories.description: NASA ($24B), National Science Foundation, NOAA, energy research

subcategories.name: Justice & Law Enforcement
subcategories.description: FBI, federal prisons, courts, DEA, ATF, U.S. Marshals, legal services

subcategories.name: Environment & Natural Resources
subcategories.description: EPA, National Park Service, Fish & Wildlife, Forest Service, BLM

subcategories.name: General Government Operations
subcategories.description: IRS, Treasury, GSA, OPM, executive offices, federal buildings

subcategories.name: Community & Regional Development
subcategories.description: Economic development grants, disaster relief, community development programs

subcategories.name: Energy & Utilities
subcategories.description: Department of Energy, nuclear weapons maintenance, energy grid, renewables

subcategories.name: Commerce & Economic Development
subcategories.description: Small Business Administration, PPP wind-down, Census Bureau, trade promotion, patents

subcategories.name: Labor Programs
subcategories.description: Job training, worker protection, OSHA, wage enforcement, labor statistics

subcategories.name: Immigration & Border Security
subcategories.description: Customs & Border Protection, ICE, immigration courts, border facilities

subcategories.name: Indian Affairs & Tribal Programs
subcategories.description: Bureau of Indian Affairs, tribal health, education, and economic development

subcategories.name: Arts, Culture & Humanities
subcategories.description: NEA, NEH, Corporation for Public Broadcasting, museums, libraries

subcategories.name: Other Federal Programs
subcategories.description: All other miscellaneous federal government operations and programs
